name: SEARCH ALL - TOOLS
description:
SEARCH ALL - TOOLS

is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the tools (mainly construction tools) in a large location. The tools will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to the most barely noticeable places. The entire game location looks lively because of the animation elements. Find all the tools! Don't let them go unnoticed :)

Key Features:
- Animation elements on location;
- 100 tools to find;
- Pleasant soundtrack;
- The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result;
- Implemented hints! If you find it difficult to find an item, use the hint!
